name: clang-format
description: Use ClangFormat in Visual Studio Code

clang-format.style.description: clang-format style.(-style=value, value can be file, LLVM, Google, Chromium, Mozilla, WebKit or json configure)

clang-format.fallbackStyle.description: clang-format fallback style.(-fallback-style=value, value can be none, LLVM, Google, Chromium, Mozilla, WebKit)

clang-format.language.cpp.style.description: clang-format fallback style for C++, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.language.cpp.fallbackStyle.description: clang-format fallback style for C++, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.c.style.description: clang-format fallback style for C, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.language.c.fallbackStyle.description: clang-format fallback style for C, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.csharp.style.description: clang-format fallback style for C#, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.language.csharp.fallbackSty.description: clang-format fallback style for C#, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.objective-c.style.description: clang-format fallback style for Objective-C, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.language.objective-c.fallba.description: clang-format fallback style for Objective-C, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.objective-cpp.styl.description: clang-format fallback style for Objective-C++, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.language.objective-cpp.fall.description: clang-format fallback style for Objective-C++, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.java.style.description: clang-format fallback style for Java, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.language.java.fallbackStyle.description: clang-format fallback style for Java, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.javascript.style.description: clang-format fallback style for JavaScript, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.language.typescript.style.description: clang-format fallback style for TypeScript, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.language.proto.style.description: clang-format fallback style for Protobuf, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.language.proto.fallbackStyl.description: clang-format fallback style for Protobuf, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.apex.style.description: clang-format fallback style for Apex, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.language.apex.fallbackStyle.description: clang-format fallback style for Apex, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.textproto.style.description: clang-format fallback style for textproto, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.language.textproto.fallback.description: clang-format fallback style for textproto, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.glsl.style.description: clang-format fallback style for GLSL, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.language.glsl.fallbackStyle.description: clang-format fallback style for GLSL, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.hlsl.style.description: clang-format fallback style for HLSL, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.language.hlsl.fallbackStyle.description: clang-format fallback style for HLSL, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.cuda.style.description: clang-format fallback style for CUDA, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.language.cuda.fallbackStyle.description: clang-format fallback style for CUDA, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.cuda-cpp.style.description: clang-format fallback style for CUDA, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.language.cuda-cpp.fallbackS.description: clang-format fallback style for CUDA, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.assumeFilename.description: When reading from stdin, clang-format assumes this filename to look for a style config file (with -style=file) and to determine the language.

scripts.postversion: vsce package && git push && cross-var git push origin v$npm_package_version && cross-var gh release create v$npm_package_version && cross-var gh release upload v$npm_package_version clang-format-$npm_package_version.vsix --clobber && cross-var vsce publish $npm_package_version
